hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that Barinade fears Deku Nuts.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #the Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Sun's Song#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple GS Sun on Floor Room
